Sentencas: Novel one-step mechanical processing was proposed to prepare LSM/ScSZ composite particles from the starting raw powders of LSM (strontium doped lanthanum manganite) and ScSZ (scandium stabilized zirconia) fine powder.
Titulo: One-step mechanical processing to prepare LSM/ScSZ composite particles for SOFC cathode

Sentencas: In this paper, the properties of composite particles made by this method and the properties of the resultant cells were evaluated.
Titulo: One-step mechanical processing to prepare LSM/ScSZ composite particles for SOFC cathode

Sentencas: As a result, LSM/ScSZ composite particles were obtained by only 10 min mechanical processing using three kinds of raw powder materials of LSM and ScSZ fine particles without extra heat.
Titulo: One-step mechanical processing to prepare LSM/ScSZ composite particles for SOFC cathode

Sentencas: The maximum power density of the cell made by the composite particles at 800 degrees C reached 320 mW/cm(2).
Titulo: One-step mechanical processing to prepare LSM/ScSZ composite particles for SOFC cathode

Sentencas: It was higher than that made by commercially available LSM nanosized powder.
Titulo: One-step mechanical processing to prepare LSM/ScSZ composite particles for SOFC cathode

Sentencas: Besides, the polarization resistance of the cathode made by the composite particles at 800 degrees C was 0.5 Omega cm(2) which was lower than that made by using commercially available LSM powder.
Titulo: One-step mechanical processing to prepare LSM/ScSZ composite particles for SOFC cathode

Sentencas: It suggests that the proposed method is very promising for producing high quality composite particles used for SOFC cathodes by more simple and energy-saving way.
Titulo: One-step mechanical processing to prepare LSM/ScSZ composite particles for SOFC cathode
One-step mechanical processing to prepare LSM/ScSZ composite particles for SOFC cathode
